short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your new tabs with todo lists, bookmark cards, and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Custom new tabs!
Tired of your boring old new tab screen? It's time to use custom chrome to fully customize your own. Easy one-time sign up lets you use your new tab wherever you go, with encrypted data to keep you safe! From To-Do lists to customizable bookmarks, the features are endless!
